news.title: Honors College Research Award
news.summary: Congrats to Winston, Johnmark, Taisei, Malachi, Bryan for the Honors College Research Award.

news.title: SURF Award
news.summary: Congrats to Ethan and Anh for the SURF Award

news.title: New AI Tool Mimics Radiologist Gaze to Read Chest X-Rays
news.summary: Le and her team, in collaboration with the MD Anderson Cancer Center in Houston, are now working to refine ItpCtrl-AI so it can read more complex, three-dimensional CT scans.

news.title: Ngan Le Receives Prestigious NSF CAREER Award for AI Research
news.summary: Ngan Le, an associate professor in the Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, has been awarded the prestigious National Science Foundation Faculty Early Career Development award.

news.title: Technology Ventures Inventor's Spotlight: Ngan Le
news.summary: Through her research on artificial intelligence and computer vision, Ngan Le works to bridge the gap between human intuition and machine logic.
